sentences.en: The kitchen sink had been stopped up and the faucet left running, so water spilled over onto the floor.
sentences.cn: 那厨房的洗涤槽堵塞了，而水龙头在那里流水，所以水溢满流到了地板上。

sentences.en: If God turns off one faucet, he can turn on another.
sentences.cn: 如果上帝关上一个水龙头，他能开启另一个。

sentences.en: A thin stream of water trickled from the faucet and half-filled the glass.
sentences.cn: 一线细水从那龙头里流出来，注满了那杯子的一半。
